mapper.select: SELECT ACCOUNT_ID , ASSET_ID , CATEGORY_ID , ACCOUNT_TYPE , ACCOUNT_DATE , AMOUNT , DESCRIPTION , CREATE_DT FROM T_ACCOUNT_BOOK
SELECT ASSET_ID , ASSET_TYPE , CURRENT_BALANCE FROM T_ASSETS

SELECT ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '01' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '01' , ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '02' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '02' , ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '03' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '03' , ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '04' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '04' , ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '05' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '05' , ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '06' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '06' , ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '07' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '07' , ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '08' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '08' , ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '09' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '09' , ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '10' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '10' , ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '11' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '11' , ABS(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 6, 2) = '12' THEN AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) AS '12' FROM T_ACCOUNT_BOOK WHERE ACCOUNT_TYPE = 'O' AND SUBSTR(ACCOUNT_DATE, 1, 4) = #{year}
